description:
This course is not sponsored by or affiliated with Udemy, Inc.

Udemy Promotional Videos

Learn how to create a Udemy promotional video and improve your Udemy marketing and Udemy sales!

You have just 5 to 12 seconds

To get someone's attention with your promo video

You then have about 1 minute to persuade someone to buy your product

A good promo increases sales

It is a proven fact that a good promo video will dramatically increase your sell through rate…

The promotional video is the most powerful tool for getting sales on your course landing page

But what makes a good promo video?

What are the things you need to do and the things you need to avoid?

A bad video will cause you to lose potential sales…

A good video will generate sales for you…

Learn how to create good promo videos that convert!

In this course you will learn the psychological steps that a buyer takes when buying your course

And you will learn how to incorporate that process into your promo video…

You will also learn how to film your video and create simple powerful talking heads promos that get sales!

So why listen to me?

I run an online marketing and video production company that helps businesses create powerful marketing strategies and we also specialise in video marketing.

The company is called SME Heroes and is very easy to find...

What I teach here are the techniques we use commercially, to produce marketing videos for our clients, who pay us thousands of pounds to produce their videos for them.

Who is this course for?

Do you have an online course that needs a good promo so that you can get more sales?

Maybe you run a business and want to produce a simple, yet powerful promotional video on a budget?

You may even want to learn some video production techniques, like filming talking heads to improve your marketing videos?

If you answered yes to any of these questions, then this course is for you.

What is covered in the course:

  • The difference between a promotional video and a introductory video
  • Psychology of a promotional video
  • AIDA scripting techniques
  • Choosing a camera
  • Choosing lights and sound equipment on a budget
  • Teleprompters on a budget
  • Creating your own studio
  • Setting up your lighting
  • Setting up your sound
  • Setting up your camera
  • Setting up your composition
  • On camera presence
  • Intros & outros
  • Keynote animation tips
  • Basic editing skills you need to learn
  • Example promotional videos

Take the course:

Before we go any further, let me just say, I don't want you to be disappointed.

If you don't like the course for any reason, you can request a full refund in the first 30 days, no questions asked.

So join me on the other side and learn how to create powerful, yet simple promotional videos that will generate sales!
